mapper.sql: select b.batch_id, b.batch_name, b.part_type_id, b.quantity, b.production_line, b.dev_id, b.expected_start_time, b.expected_end_time, b.detect_status, b.detect_start_time, b.detect_end_time, b.qualified_quantity, b.unqualified_quantity, b.qualified_rate, b.create_by, b.create_time, b.remark, pt.part_type_name, e.dev_name, p.part_id, p.part_name, p.part_type_id, p.detect_time,p.detect_status ,p.detect_result from sys_batch b inner join sys_part_type pt on b.part_type_id = pt.part_type_id inner join sys_equipment e on b.dev_id = e.dev_id left join sys_batch_part bp on b.batch_id = bp.batch_id left join sys_part_data p on p.part_id = bp.part_id
mapper.insert: insert into sys_batch( batch_id, batch_name, part_type_id, quantity, production_line, dev_id, expected_start_time, expected_end_time, detect_status, create_by, remark, create_time )values ( #{batchId}, #{batchName}, #{partTypeId}, #{quantity}, #{productionLine}, #{devId}, #{expectedStartTime}, #{expectedEndTime}, #{detectStatus}, #{createBy}, #{remark}, sysdate() )
mapper.select: select batch_id , batch_name from sys_batch where batch_name = #{batchName} limit 1
mapper.delete: update sys_batch set del_flag = '2' where batch_id = #{batchId} where batch_id = #{batchId}
